content.question: The <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mi>pH</mi></math> of a <math alttext="0.009 molar" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.009</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></math> solution of <math alttext="K O H, aqueous" overflow="scroll"><mi>KOH</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi mathvariant="italic">a</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> is closest to which of the following?

topic.text: 8.2: pH and pOH of Strong Acids and Bases

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
